audio_file: Relay the message John Roland Duenas Marivic Crisostomo 618267470523 030425.wav

transcription.text: Good morning po. Sino po sila?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: This is John Roland Duenas from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Nandiyan na po ba si Mr. Marivic or Ma'am Marivic? Nandiyan na po ba?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ala pa po. Ala po dito yun.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ala po kung ano po ba ang ibibilin ninyo. Kasi hindi ko naman po yung nakikita eh. Papasabi ko lang po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Kaano-ano niyo po ba siya, ma'am?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Nilagay niya po kasi itong cellphone number na ito as a personal contact number, ma'am. Nakapangalan po kasi sa kanya. Kaya po namin kayo natatawagan,
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: ma'am. So, bali ganito na lang, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Paparilay na lang po ako ng message, ma'am, na kailangan niya po kasing ma-update yung kanyang Maya Bank po. Tumatawag na po kasi sa inyo si Credit Max regarding sa kanyang Maya Bank po. Okay lang po, ba?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Opo. Opo. Opo. Sasabi ko na lang po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sige po. By the way, ma'am, this is General Anduenia from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line po tayo. Maraming salamat po, ma'am, sa pag-relay po ng message po, ma'am. God bless you po sa inyo. Ingat po tayo palagi. Bye-bye po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Thank you din po. Thank you po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

translation.tagalog: Good morning po. Sino po sila?
This is John Roland Duenas from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Nandiyan na po ba si Mr. Marivic or Ma'am Marivic? Nandiyan na po ba?
translation.english: This is John Roland Duenas from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Is Mr. Marivic or Ma'am Marivic there? Are they there?

translation.tagalog: Ala pa po. Ala po dito yun.
translation.english: Not yet. That person isn't here.
What is your relation to them, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Ala po kung ano po ba ang ibibilin ninyo. Kasi hindi ko naman po yung nakikita eh. Papasabi ko lang po.
translation.english: Nothing. What would you like to leave as a message? Because I don’t really see that person. I’ll just pass on the message.

translation.tagalog: Kaano-ano niyo po ba siya, ma'am?
translation.english: What is your relation to them, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Nilagay niya po kasi itong cellphone number na ito as a personal contact number, ma'am. Nakapangalan po kasi sa kanya. Kaya po namin kayo natatawagan,
translation.english: Because they listed this cellphone number as a personal contact number, ma'am. It's under their name. That's why we're able to call you.

translation.tagalog: ma'am. So, bali ganito na lang, ma'am.
translation.english: Ma'am. So let’s do it this way, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Paparilay na lang po ako ng message, ma'am, na kailangan niya po kasing ma-update yung kanyang Maya Bank po. Tumatawag na po kasi sa inyo si Credit Max regarding sa kanyang Maya Bank po. Okay lang po, ba?
translation.english: I'll just relay the message, ma'am, that they need to update their Maya Bank. Credit Max has been calling about their Maya Bank. Is that okay?

translation.tagalog: Opo. Opo. Opo. Sasabi ko na lang po.
translation.english: Yes. Yes. Yes. I’ll just let them know.

translation.tagalog: Sige po. By the way, ma'am, this is General Anduenia from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line po tayo. Maraming salamat po, ma'am, sa pag-relay po ng message po, ma'am. God bless you po sa inyo. Ingat po tayo palagi. Bye-bye po.
translation.english: Alright. By the way, ma'am, this is General Anduenia from Credit Max calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Thank you very much, ma'am, for relaying the message. God bless you. Take care always. Goodbye.

translation.tagalog: Thank you din po. Thank you po.
